testcase.name: adding a Platform to an empty list adds to ArrayList()
listActivePlatforms returns active platforms when ArrayList has active platforms stored()
listAllPlatforms returns No Platforms Stored message when ArrayList is empty()
listPlatformsBySelectedPopularity returns no platforms when no platforms of that popularity exist()
listPlatformsBySelectedPopularity returns No platforms when ArrayList is empty()
listDiscontinuedPlatforms returns discontinued platforms when ArrayList has discontinued platforms stored()
listActivePlatforms returns no active platforms stored when ArrayList is empty()
adding a Platform to a populated list adds to ArrayList()
listDiscontinuedPlatforms returns no discontinued platforms when ArrayList is empty()
listPlatformsBySelectedPopularity returns all platforms that match that popularity when platforms of that popularity exist()
listAllPlatforms returns Notes when ArrayList has notes stored()
